overview.en: XBC plans to adopt a blockchain to build an ecosystem of Internet of Things (IoT) that is comprehensive, living and practical. This will promote and accelerate development of the Internet of Things to enable rapid growth of this smart era.
overview.zh: 星博链计划采用区块链，构建一个全方位、生活化、实用性高的物联网生态链，促进物联网时代的加速发展，让智慧時代快速的萌芽。
